title: I can't download LOL
body: I go to the website and download League then when the actual game pops up it has to update and gets through some of it before it pops up and says an unexpected error has occurred. This has happened many times. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling it and can't find anything that works.

replies.body: When do you receive the unexpected error, like at a certain % during the update?  Do you have a screenshot?  With a little more info I may be able to help!
